thread.title: National Television Awards 2017: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield party until 4am despite early start
thread.title_full: National Television Awards 2017: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield party until 4am despite early start

author: Jennifer ruby
title: National Television Awards 2017: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield party until 4am despite early start
text:
National Television Awards 2017: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield party until 4am despite early start 
The presenting pair were celebrating their win until the early hours Thursday 26 January 2017 08:47 BST Click to followES Entertainment Late night: Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield party until 4am Holly Willoughby/Instagram 
Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield were still partying at 4am following their National Television Awards win. 
The presenting duo, who won the trophy for Best Live Magazine Show, were snapped sipping on cocktails just hours before they were due to host Thursday’s This Morning. 
Clearly keen to celebrate, Willoughby shared a picture of the pair at the afterparty in the early hours, writing: 
“Thank you.... and... good night @schofe ... you are the bestest! Xxx.” A photo posted by Phillip Schofield (@schofe) on Jan 25, 2017 at 4:27pm PST A photo posted by Holly Willoughby (@hollywilloughby) on Jan 25, 2017 at 6:58pm PST A photo posted by Phillip Schofield (@schofe) on Jan 25, 2017 at 7:33pm PST 
Schofield posted a photo of his co-host on the dancefloor clutching their trophy, under the caption: “She's on her way.” 
Despite having to be in the studio to present the show for 10.30am, Willoughby and Schofield were still in the Groucho Club at 4am. National Television Awards: The big winners on the night 
After last year’s NTAs, the pair showed up to present This Morning in the same clothes that they had been wearing the night before. 
Ant and Dec reigned supreme at this year’s television awards, picking up their 16th trophy for Best Presenter. Read more
